Team4450.Lib

Class MonitorDistanceMBX

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Team4450.Lib.MonitorDistanceMBX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MonitorDistanceMBX
extends java.lang.Thread
    Task to monitor ultrasonic sensor and report distance to driver station. Runs as a thread separate from Robot class. Runs until our program is terminated from the RoboRio. Displays distance value on DS. Uses MaxBotix ultrasonic sensor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

        public static MonitorDistanceMBX getInstance(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SampleRobot robot)
